p: The existence of complex formulations of herbal teas with a high number of ingredients is not unique to the Eastern Mediterranean Region. On the island of Madeira (Portugal), located in the Atlantic, a formula “for all ills” with forty ingredients was listed, with numerous endemic plant species and a parasitic fungus [ Laurobasidium lauri (Geyl.) Jülich] ( Rivera and Obón 1995a; Rivera and Obón, 1995b).
